2077930.name: Sky Mammoths
2077930.description:
The near future is bleak: resources are becoming scarce, and a few monopolies control them. Automated freighters decide how to distribute the remaining resources among the impoverished population.

The freighters have been named 'Sky Mammoths' – not only due to their massive size but also to mark the beginning of a new age for mankind. They fly in the sky – out of reach for billions of hungry and angry people.

One day, you don't get any resources delivered. Now you have two choices: you either starve to death or do what your ancestors did long ago in times of hunger and need: hunt mammoths!

Raid Freighters


  • PLAN ahead by learning freighter delivery patterns and syncing with them while dividing your rations
  • RAID procedurally generated freighters, decide which container to destroy and which one to save - it will have consequences
  • USE the freighters' defense system to your advantage

Redistribute your Loot


  • REDISTRIBUTE your loot to where it's really needed
  • TRADE resources
  • BUILD factories to process stolen resources
  • INVEST to make people more independent again

Explore


  • COLLECT drones with helpful skills
  • UPGRADE your Sky Bike, weapons and drones
  • EXPLORE new areas

Overturn the System


  • INFLUENCE supply and demand
  • EXPOSE fraud
  • EXPERIENCE a great story
  • OVERTURN the monopolistic system
